How to Install rhythmbox-ampache on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • rhythmbox-ampache

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install rhythmbox-ampache on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing rhythmbox-ampache on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall rhythmbox-ampache in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install rhythmbox-ampache, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install rhythmbox-ampache Using apt

To install rhythmbox-ampache in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install rhythmbox-ampache using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install rhythmbox-ampache

The installation of rhythmbox-ampache might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install rhythmbox-ampache Using apt-get

To install rhythmbox-ampache using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install rhythmbox-ampache.

sudo apt-get -y install rhythmbox-ampache

Install rhythmbox-ampache Using Synaptic

To install rhythmbox-ampache using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install rhythmbox-ampache on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for rhythmbox-ampache. This will display the rhythmbox-ampache package in the package window, now to install rhythmbox-ampache, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the rhythmbox-ampache package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of rhythmbox-ampache.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install rhythmbox-ampache Using aptitude

To install rhythmbox-ampache on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of rhythmbox-ampache.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install rhythmbox-ampache using the command aptitude install rhythmbox-ampache.

sudo aptitude -y install rhythmbox-ampache

How to Upgrade rhythmbox-ampache on debian

If you want to upgrade the rhythmbox-ampache package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade rhythmbox-ampache to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade rhythmbox-ampache.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade rhythmbox-ampache sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade rhythmbox-ampache

Upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using Aptitude

To upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade rhythmbox-ampache.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade rhythmbox-ampache

Upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using Synaptic

To upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for rhythmbox-ampache, now right-click rhythmbox-ampache, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade rhythmbox-ampache just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall rhythmbox-ampache on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall rhythmbox-ampache from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just rhythmbox-ampache, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove rhythmbox-ampache

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of rhythmbox-ampache

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of rhythmbox-ampache you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge rhythmbox-ampache

Remove rhythmbox-ampache using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall rhythmbox-ampache using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for rhythmbox-ampache, right-click the rhythmbox-ampache package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall rhythmbox-ampache click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install rhythmbox-ampache on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade rhythmbox-ampache using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of rhythmbox-ampache then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
